title: DOULGLAS FAIRBANKS JR presents Bulldog Drummond

sources.title: DoulglasFairbanksJrPresentsBulldogDrummond
sources.description: "Douglas Fairbanks Jr Presents Bulldog Drummond and 'The Ludlow Affair'" Series 5 Episode 13 (28 January 1957) This was made as a pilot for a possible series. When it wasn't picked up the pilot was used as an episode in the "Douglas Fairbanks Presents" series. Cast Douglas Fairbanks Jr - Host Robert Beatty - Bulldog Drummond Greta Gynt - Mrs. Harriette Ludlow Michael Ripper - Kelly William Franklyn - Roger Benning Harry Lane - Kinsella John Le Mesurier - Inspector Burroughs Michael Anthony - Dr. Felix Ludlow Ian Fleming - Churchill US production shot in the UK in 1952
